post.body: I'm pretty sure it's Kota the Triceratops...have you seen it? It's huge!
virtual, eh? I'd have to see what's involved...!
LOL! Definitely not my strong point either... :)
Lot's of luck to ya! I remember being a Daisy scout! :) Have fun.
no prob! :)
I'm having trouble with twitpic also have attempted various times to upload a pic and nothing....frustrated with em'
isn't stumbleupon a great tool? It really bumps up the traffic 3 fold. :) Nice!
oh cool- I love Amazon...I'll look into it- my mom has a Vita Mix and I have a Jack Llallane but his huge and bulky...!
I've heard great things about the Blendtec...need to look into it further. That's awesome.
I'd agree- a bit bright!
you're telling me...I think we may be upside down! Need to look into it. Scary thought!
Looks great! :) Happy moving!!! = )
Clark has been pretty active too- have you thought about any girlie names????
only 19 weeks- that really doesn't seem like a long time does it...when you break it down that way- holy moly!! :)
I hope they'll be best buds. You're getting the best of both worlds- awesome! :) When r u due?
oh, phew! hopefully, it will just go away and not make it to your county at all! :)
I bet they do!! That's so neat. :)
@JessTrev It is a big accomplisment- and for us parents too!!! He was definitely praised and were on the right track! Thx. :)
are you following @savvydoula or KnoxvilleDoula??
Hang in there! Hope there's something they can do for you. :)
it was pretty darn funny and fun! The bar I worked at for a few years did that for their X-Mas parties!
People can exchange for something else they rcvd...luckily someone else wanted it but then I ended up with a stale canister of puffs.
Basically, you don't buy a gift you find something around your home you don't want anymore- I rcvd' a mailbox one yr. LOL!
Now that sounds really good- a chocolate martini- oh boy! May have to test those out! thanks!! :)
mmm...that would be a good one- thanks... :)
oooh, that's going to be really chilly for you, in those parts! They're forcasting snow here- haven't seen snow in 4 yrs.!!!
yes, must have the freshly made buttercream frosting!! :p A peppermint brownie sounds delish!
LOL! I think I just might do that! :) Their both easy...
I think that's what I'm leaning towards...maybe I'll do both- cuz I want to use up some sprinkles from last yr. :)
thank you - much appreciated. :)
same here, thanks! :) Love The Beatles!!!!!
3 and 1/2 really...
Thank you!! :) 3 more months and it's going to go fast come the new year!
I can't believe how accurate it is...blows me away!
April 4th...give or take.. :)
it's my go to book for friends and family and even for this baby that we're expecting! Neat book. :)
We had thought about not finding out either- went out the window- and glad we did too! :)
called The Secret Language of Birthdays...awesome book. :) Mine is to "the t"!
Oh cool! I'm the 27th- do you have the book about birthdays- where you can look up the day you were born?
Just sent you an email!
Congratulations!!!! :) A boy!!! So neat...you'll have both a boy and a girl! :)
Just realized I never responded to your email- doing so know!!! :)
Hi Monica! :)
I'm an Aquarius- end of Jan- and you?
I'd be interested... :)
LOL! :) He's definitely drowning in cowboy get up- LOL!
Yep- the big 3-0...it'll be my turn next month...what about you??!!
You're sooo right! I was just thinking about that as I assemble my X-Mas cards. Thanks. :)
thanks, pretty funny looking back- he's wearing my dad's boots and hat- LOL!
That's a long time- you deserve some new bra's! Go mama!!! :)
I can somewhat relate my lil 21 mos. old has finally weaned completely and it is heartbreaking in a way- hugs to you!
Glad we've been able to connect more through twitter!! :)
Srsly! O'well...there's always next year...LOL!!! ;)
Happy New Year to you and yours!!! :)
That's awesome, maybe next time I visit I'll get the chance to ride a bike- looks like a lot of fun! :)
Wishing you and yours a Happy New Year! :) Glad to have met you through twitter.
Last year they had a fire outside as well, but not nearly this big- it's huge and in the snow- what more you you ask for?
Happy New Year~
thank you- starting out good so far- feliz ano nuevo!!!
Get 10% off ur order at 90210 Organics- read on...http://tinyurl.com/66mgk9
New @ RYD: 90210 Organics Lip BalM Review: http://tinyurl.com/66mgk9
New @ RYD: Sniffle Tissue and Germ Fighter: http://tinyurl.com/59qsgr
Lil man just did a doody in his potty- first time!!! Woot! He's making such good progress! :) Doing the happy dance.
any suggestions...easy...of course! ;)
looking up non alcholic foo-foo drinks for next Saturday's birthday bash- my friend and I are going to be the only ones who can't drink!
It's a really chilly day out- planning to pick mistletoe later if it doesn't rain on us! :)
thinking about making some sugar cookies or peanut butter...hmmm??? I feel like I need to do some sort of baking today! :)
out of it I looked over and there it was sitting right next to me!!!! Yes!! I can get back to things as usual... :) Gave me a headache!
Phew- found the card- little man shoved into the play wallet he was playing with- that I checked a couple of times- he's emptying his change
http://twitpic.com/uebv - My lil Buckaroo!
80% chance of snow tomorrow...we might just get stuck here for a few more days! That'd be okay with me. :)
The huge bonfire last night didn't burn like it did last year...but it was still neat. Went to the oldest cemetary in Ca. today-pretty cool!
Hola Tweeples! How's everyone this lovely New Years Day?! Doing well here in mtn's of NorCal and loving every minute.
New @ RYD: Happy New Year: http://tinyurl.com/8wxayd
Happy New Year to you and yours!!! Wishing you all Peace, Love & Green Happiness. Happiness in general... ;)
Okay, peeps when I get back on my lappy I promise to twitpic the huge bonfire we're having tonight for now- I must leave you!
RT @SingleMomClaire I would love 2 meet some new twitters this NY Eve! Anyone want to tweet for some ppl 2 follow me & I will follow back!
Hope everyone has a nice New Years Eve...our friends have a 3 story fire built outside that's going to burn for hrs. I will twitpic it!
Hi all, made it to Trinity...it's a winter wonderland...we're enjoying a nice wood burning stove fire and hanging out with friends. :)
okay, really- shutting her down- bye all! :)
